title: Unicity problem on meromorphic mappings of complete Kahler manifolds
abstract:
Nevanlinna's unicity theorems have always held an important position in value
distribution theory. The main purpose of this paper is to generalize the
classical Nevanlinna's unicity theorems to non-compact complete Kahler
manifolds with nonpositive sectional curvature or nonnegative Ricci curvature.
